typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Transaction Amount} as double,
		{Local  Amount} as double,
		{Group  Amount} as double,
		{Vendor Name} as string,
		{Vendor Code} as string,
		{Transaction Currency} as string,
		System as string,
		{Sub Ledger Source} as string,
		{PO Number} as string,
		{Local  Currency} as string,
		{Invoice Number} as string,
		{GL Posting Date} as timestamp,
		{Document Number} as string,
		{Doc Narration} as string,
		{Doc Line Number} as long,
		{Company (Desc)} as string,
		Company as string,
		{Country (Desc)} as string,
		Country as string,
		YearMonth as string,
		{GL Account (Code)} as string,
		{GL Account (Desc)} as string,
		NIS_Desc as string,
		{Profit Center (Desc)} as string,
		{Profit Center} as string,
		{Cost Center (Code)} as string,
		{Cost Center (Desc)} as string,
		{User Gin} as string,
		{Reversed Flag} as string,
		{Reference Document} as string,
		{Transaction Code} as string,
		{Transaction Code Description} as string,
		{LDAP User Alias} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Transaction Amount]\n      ,[Local  Amount]\n      ,[Group  Amount]\n      ,[Vendor Name]\n      ,[Vendor Code]\n      ,[Transaction Currency]\n      ,[Document Type] as [System]\n      ,[Sub Ledger Source]\n      ,[PO Number]\n      ,[Local  Currency]\n      ,[Invoice Number]\n      ,[GL Posting Date]\n	  ,[Document Number]\n      ,[Doc Narration]\n      ,[Doc Line Number]\n      ,[Company (Desc)]\n      ,[Company]\n      ,[Country (Desc)]\n      ,[Country]\n      ,[YearMonth]\n      ,Left([GL Account (Code)],8) as [GL Account (Code)]\n      ,[GL Account (Desc)]\n      ,[HFM Level 3 (Desc)] as NIS_Desc\n      ,[Profit Center (Desc)]\n      ,[Profit Center]\n      ,[Cost Center (Code)]\n      ,[Cost Center (Desc)]\n      ,[User Gin]\n      ,[Reversed Flag]\n      ,[Reference Document]\n      ,[Transaction Code]\n      ,[Transaction Code Description]\n      ,[LDAP User Alias]\n  FROM [SSO_REPORTER_SOURCE].[SRC_FI_SAPITT_GL_TRANSACTIONS]\nWhere [Account Type] = \'NIS\' \nAnd [GL Account (Code)] >= \'50000000\' And [GL Account (Code)] < \'70000000\' And \nYearMonth = (Select Max(YearMonth) From [SSO_REPORTER_SOURCE].[SRC_FI_SAPITT_GL_TRANSACTIONS] )',
	format: 'query',
	staged: true) ~> SrcSAPITTGLTransaciton
source(output(
		ERP as string,
		SubAccnt_Minor as string,
		PnL_Sub_group as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select ERP,SubAccnt_Minor,PnL_Sub_group  from [NGBS].[SRC_FI_SPO_FSPO_GL_Accounts_Mapping_part1_temp] Where ERP IN (\'SAP ECC\')',
	format: 'query',
	staged: true) ~> SrcGLAccountMappingSapECC
source(output(
		ERP as string,
		ERP_UID as string,
		Facility_ID as string,
		Facility_Name as string,
		Facility_Status as string,
		Facility_Type as string,
		Facility_Owner as string,
		Business_Activity as string,
		Origin_Business as string,
		FDE_Country as string,
		FDE_City as string,
		Latitude as double,
		Longitude as double,
		Land_Area_Square_Meter as decimal(25,0),
		Build_Area_Square_Meter as decimal(25,0),
		Account_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select * from NGBS.SRC_FFAC_Facilities_Mapping_Part2_temp where ERP in (\'SAP ITT\')',
	format: 'query',
	staged: true) ~> SrcFacilitiesMappingg
source(output(
		ERP as string,
		{GL Account} as string,
		{Account (Desc)} as string,
		GLAccountERP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select Case when ERP = \'SAP ECC\' THEN \'SAP ITT\'  else ERP end as ERP, [GL Account],[Account (Desc)],\n  ltrim(rtrim([GL Account]))+Case when ERP = \'SAP ECC\' THEN \'SAP ITT\'  else ltrim(rtrim(ERP)) end as GLAccountERP From [SSO_SHAREPOINT_SOURCE].[SRC_FI_SPO_FSPO_FFACZeroizationAccount]',
	format: 'query',
	staged: true) ~> SrcZeroizationAccount
source(output(
		{Product Line (Code)} as string,
		{Product Line Group (Code)} as string,
		{Profit Center (Code)} as string,
		{SL Product Line (Code)} as string,
		{SL Product Line (Desc)} as string,
		{SL Product Line Group (Code)} as string,
		{SL Product Line Group (Desc)} as string,
		{SL Sub Product Line (Code)} as string,
		{SL Sub Product Line (Desc)} as string,
		{Sub Product Line (Code)} as string,
		{Area (Code)} as string,
		{Geomarket (Code)} as string,
		{SL Area (Code)} as string,
		{SL Area (Desc)} as string,
		{SL Geomarket (Code)} as string,
		{SL Geomarket (Desc)} as string,
		{SL Hemisphere (Code)} as string,
		{SL Hemisphere (Desc)} as string,
		{Sub Geomarket (Code)} as string,
		SYS_CreatedBy as string,
		SYS_CreatedDate as timestamp,
		{Country (Code)} as string,
		{Country (Desc)} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'Select * From [SSO_REPORTER_SOURCE].[SRC_Org_mapping_SAP_ITT] (Nolock)',
	format: 'query',
	staged: true) ~> SrcSapITTMappinng
source(output(
		{Profit Center (Code)} as string,
		{SL Hemisphere (Code)} as string,
		{SL Hemisphere (Desc)} as string,
		{SL Area (Code)} as string,
		{SL Geomarket (Code)} as string,
		{Sub Geomarket (Code)} as string,
		{SL Product Line Group (Code)} as string,
		{Product Line Group (Code)} as string,
		{SL Product Line (Code)} as string,
		{Product Line (Code)} as string,
		{SL Sub Product Line (Code)} as string,
		{Sub Product Line (Code)} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Profit Center (Code)]\n      ,[SL Hemisphere (Code)]\n      ,[SL Hemisphere (Desc)]\n      ,[SL Area (Code)]\n      ,[SL Geomarket (Code)]\n      ,[Sub Geomarket (Code)]\n      ,[SL Product Line Group (Code)]\n      ,[Product Line Group (Code)]\n      ,[SL Product Line (Code)]\n      ,[Product Line (Code)]\n      ,[SL Sub Product Line (Code)]\n      ,[Sub Product Line (Code)]\n  FROM [SSO_SHAREPOINT_SOURCE].[SRC_FI_SPO_FSPO_FFACSLOrgSAPITT] (Nolock)\n  Where [SL Hemisphere (Code)] != \'\' \n      and [SL Hemisphere (Desc)] != \'\'\n      and [SL Area (Code)] != \'\'\n      and [SL Geomarket (Code)] != \'\'\n      and [Sub Geomarket (Code)] != \'\'\n      and [SL Product Line Group (Code)] != \'\'\n      and [Product Line Group (Code)] != \'\'\n      and [SL Product Line (Code)] != \'\'\n      and [Product Line (Code)] != \'\'\n      and [SL Sub Product Line (Code)] != \'\'\n      and [Sub Product Line (Code)] != \'\'\n',
	format: 'query',
	staged: true) ~> SrcOrgSapITT
SrcFacilitiesMappingg filter(Account_Type == 'Zeroization') ~> FltZeroization
SelRenameMulFields, FltZeroization join(ERP_UID_Zeroization == ERP_UID,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JnrInnerZeroization
ExsZeriozation, FltSpend join(ERP_UID_SPEND == ERP_UID,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JnrInnerSpend
SrcFacilitiesMappingg filter(Account_Type != 'Zeroization') ~> FltSpend
JnrInnerZeroization, JnrInnerSpend union(byName: true)~> UnZeroizationandSpend
SelRenameMulFields, FltZeroization exists(ERP_UID_Zeroization == ERP_UID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExsZeriozation
ExsZeriozation, FltSpend exists(ERP_UID_SPEND == ERP_UID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExsSpend
DerColAccountERP, SrcZeroizationAccount join(AccountERP == GLAccountERP,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JnUnZerSPandZeroAccount
SelZeroizandSpendFields split(like(lower(AccountDesc),'%zero%') || like(lower(AccountDesc),'%char%') || like(lower(AccountDesc),'%allocation%'),
	disjoint: false) ~> SpltAccDesc@(MatchedRows, NonMatchedRows)
SpltAccDesc@MatchedRows derive(Account_Type = 'Zeroization/Recharges/Allocation') ~> DerColAccountTypeAll
SpltAccDesc@NonMatchedRows derive(Account_Type = 'Spend') ~> DerColAccTypeSpend
DerColERPAccountExs, SrcZeroizationAccount exists(AccountERP == GLAccountERP,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExsZeroSpendandZeroization
ExsZeroSpendandZeroization derive(Account_Type = 'Spend') ~> DerColAccntTypeSpend
DerColAccountTypeAll, DerColAccTypeSpend, DerColAccntTypeSpend union(byName: true)~> UnMultipleInputs
AggGroupbyMulFields select(mapColumn(
		SL_Geomarket_Code,
		Mgmt_Country_Code,
		FDE_Country,
		ERP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelGroupbyFields
SelRenameGeoMarketandMgmtCountry aggregate(groupBy(SL_Geomarket_Code,
		Mgmt_Country_Code,
		FDE_Country,
		ERP),
	each(match(!in(['SL_Geomarket_Code','Mgmt_Country_Code','FDE_Country','ERP'],name)), $$ = first($$))) ~> AggGroupbyMulFields
ExsSpend filter(NIS_Desc == 'Office & Camp' || NIS_Desc == 'Office and Camp') ~> FltOfficeCamp
FltOfficeCamp, SelGroupbyFields join({SL Geomarket (Code)} == SL_Geomarket_Code
	&& MgmtCountryCode == Mgmt_Country_Code
	&& ERP_Data == ERP,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JnrExsSpendandGrpby
SelRemoveJoinfields aggregate(groupBy(SL_Geomarket_Code,
		Mgmt_Country_Code,
		FDE_Country,
		Year,
		Month,
		ERP),
	each(match(!in(['SL_Geomarket_Code','Mgmt_Country_Code','FDE_Country','Year','Month','ERP'],name)), $$ = first($$))) ~> AggGrpbyreqfileds
AggGrpbyreqfileds select(mapColumn(
		SL_Geomarket_Code,
		Mgmt_Country_Code,
		FDE_Country,
		Year,
		Month,
		ERP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelGrpbyFieldsonly
SelGrpbyFieldsonly aggregate(groupBy(SL_Geomarket_Code,
		Mgmt_Country_Code,
		Year,
		Month,
		ERP),
	FDE_Country = first(FDE_Country)) ~> AggUniquewithoutFDECountry
FltOfficeCamp, AggUniquewithoutFDECountry join(SelRenameMulFields@Year == AggUniquewithoutFDECountry@Year
	&& SelRenameMulFields@Month == AggUniquewithoutFDECountry@Month
	&& {SL Geomarket (Code)} == SL_Geomarket_Code
	&& MgmtCountryCode == Mgmt_Country_Code,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JnrInnerOfficeCampusandUnique
FltOfficeCamp, AggUniquewithoutFDECountry exists({SL Geomarket (Code)} == SL_Geomarket_Code
	&& MgmtCountryCode == Mgmt_Country_Code
	&& SelRenameMulFields@Year == AggUniquewithoutFDECountry@Year
	&& SelRenameMulFields@Month == AggUniquewithoutFDECountry@Month,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExsOfficeCampandUnique
ExsOfficeCampandUnique derive(FDE_Country = 'N/A',
		ERP = ERP_Data) ~> DerColFDECountryandERP
SelRemoveJoinFieldss, DerColFDECountryandERP union(byName: true)~> UnUniqueandNAFDECountry
UnUniqueandNAFDECountry derive(Facility_Assigned = 'Non Facility AU') ~> DerColNonFacilityAssigned
UnMultipleInputs derive(Facility_Assigned = 'Facility AU') ~> DerColFacilityAssigned
DerColNonFacilityAssigned, DerColFacilityAssigned union(byName: true)~> UnNonFacilityAssandFacilAssigned
UnNonFacilityAssandFacilAssigned derive(ExcludeCountry = ltrim(rtrim(trim(toString(Year)+toString(Month)+iifNull(MgmtCountryCode,'')))),
		Year = toString(Year)) ~> DerColExcludeCountry
DerColExcludeCountry filter(!in(['202010AE','202010BB','202010CO','202010DK','202010GY','202010MA','202010NL','202010NO','202010PE','202010SR','202010TT'],ExcludeCountry)) ~> FltExcludeCountry
DerColMultiColSapITT, SrcGLAccountMappingSapECC join({GL Account (Code)} == SrcGLAccountMappingSapECC@SubAccnt_Minor,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JnSapITTandGLAccountMapping
DerColMultiColSapITT, SrcGLAccountMappingSapECC exists({GL Account (Code)} == SrcGLAccountMappingSapECC@SubAccnt_Minor,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExsSapITTandAccountMapping
JnSapITTandGLAccountMapping select(mapColumn(
		{Transaction Amount},
		{Local  Amount},
		{Group  Amount},
		{Vendor Name},
		{Vendor Code},
		{Transaction Currency},
		System,
		{Sub Ledger Source},
		{PO Number},
		{Local  Currency},
		{Invoice Number},
		{GL Posting Date},
		{Document Number},
		{Doc Narration},
		{Doc Line Number},
		{Company (Desc)},
		Company,
		{Country (Desc)},
		Country,
		YearMonth,
		{GL Account (Code)},
		{GL Account (Desc)},
		NIS_Desc,
		{Profit Center (Desc)},
		{Profit Center},
		{Cost Center (Code)},
		{Cost Center (Desc)},
		{User Gin},
		{Reversed Flag},
		{Reference Document},
		{Transaction Code},
		{Transaction Code Description},
		{LDAP User Alias},
		YearMonthFormat,
		{Product Line (Code)},
		{Product Line Group (Code)},
		{SL Product Line (Code)},
		{SL Product Line Group (Code)},
		{SL Sub Product Line (Code)},
		{Sub Product Line (Code)},
		{SL Area (Code)},
		{SL Geomarket (Code)},
		{SL Hemisphere (Code)},
		{SL Hemisphere (Desc)},
		{Sub Geomarket (Code)},
		SYS_CreatedBy,
		SYS_CreatedDate,
		{Country (Code)},
		Right_Country_Desc,
		SubAccnt_Minor = DerColMultiColSapITT@SubAccnt_Minor,
		Year,
		Month,
		ERP_Data,
		ERP_UID_SPEND,
		ERP_UID_Zeroization,
		PnL_Sub_group
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelReqJnFields
SelReqJnFields, ExsSapITTandAccountMapping union(byName: true)~> UnOracleandAccMapping
UnOracleandAccMapping select(mapColumn(
		TransAmount = {Transaction Amount},
		BaseAmount = {Group  Amount},
		VendorName = {Vendor Name},
		Vendor = {Vendor Code},
		CurrencyCode = {Transaction Currency},
		System,
		SourceCode = {Sub Ledger Source},
		PONumber = {PO Number},
		InvoiceNo = {Invoice Number},
		PostingDate = {GL Posting Date},
		Journal = {Document Number},
		Description = {Doc Narration},
		LineNbr = {Doc Line Number},
		{Company (Desc)},
		Company,
		CountryDesc = {Country (Desc)},
		MgmtCountryCode = Country,
		Account = {GL Account (Code)},
		Account_Desc = {GL Account (Desc)},
		NIS_Desc,
		ProfitCenterDesc = {Profit Center (Desc)},
		{Profit Center},
		CCAU = {Cost Center (Code)},
		CCAUDesc = {Cost Center (Desc)},
		{User Gin},
		{Reversed Flag},
		{Reference Document},
		{Transaction Code},
		{Transaction Code Description},
		{LDAP User Alias},
		{Product Line (Code)},
		{Product Line Group (Code)},
		{SL Product Line (Code)},
		{SL Product Line Group (Code)},
		{SL Sub Product Line (Code)},
		{Sub Product Line (Code)},
		{SL Area (Code)},
		{SL Geomarket (Code)},
		{SL Hemisphere (Code)},
		{SL Hemisphere (Desc)},
		{Sub Geomarket (Code)},
		SYS_CreatedBy,
		SYS_CreatedDate,
		{Country (Code)},
		Right_Country_Desc,
		SubAccnt_Minor,
		Year,
		Month,
		ERP_Data,
		ERP_UID_SPEND,
		ERP_UID_Zeroization,
		NIS_SubLine = PnL_Sub_group
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelRenameMulFields
JnUnZerSPandZeroAccount select(mapColumn(
		TransAmount,
		BaseAmount,
		VendorName,
		Vendor,
		CurrencyCode,
		System,
		SourceCode,
		PONumber,
		InvoiceNo,
		PostingDate,
		Journal,
		Description,
		LineNbr,
		{Company (Desc)},
		Company,
		CountryDesc,
		MgmtCountryCode,
		Account,
		Account_Desc,
		NIS_Desc,
		ProfitCenterDesc,
		{Profit Center},
		CCAU,
		CCAUDesc,
		{User Gin},
		{Reversed Flag},
		{Reference Document},
		{Transaction Code},
		{Transaction Code Description},
		{LDAP User Alias},
		{Product Line (Code)},
		{Product Line Group (Code)},
		{SL Product Line (Code)},
		{SL Product Line Group (Code)},
		{SL Sub Product Line (Code)},
		{Sub Product Line (Code)},
		{SL Area (Code)},
		{SL Geomarket (Code)},
		{SL Hemisphere (Code)},
		{SL Hemisphere (Desc)},
		{Sub Geomarket (Code)},
		SYS_CreatedBy,
		SYS_CreatedDate,
		{Country (Code)},
		Right_Country_Desc,
		SubAccnt_Minor,
		Year,
		Month,
		ERP_Data,
		ERP_UID_SPEND,
		ERP_UID_Zeroization,
		NIS_SubLine,
		ERP = UnZeroizationandSpend@ERP,
		ERP_UID,
		Facility_ID,
		Facility_Name,
		Facility_Status,
		Facility_Type,
		Facility_Owner,
		Business_Activity,
		Origin_Business,
		FDE_Country,
		FDE_City,
		Latitude,
		Longitude,
		Land_Area_Square_Meter,
		Build_Area_Square_Meter,
		Account_Type,
		{GL Account},
		AccountDesc = {Account (Desc)}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelZeroizandSpendFields
UnMultipleInputs select(mapColumn(
		TransAmount,
		BaseAmount,
		VendorName,
		Vendor,
		CurrencyCode,
		System,
		SourceCode,
		PONumber,
		InvoiceNo,
		PostingDate,
		Journal,
		Description,
		LineNbr,
		{Company (Desc)},
		Company,
		CountryDesc,
		Mgmt_Country_Code = MgmtCountryCode,
		Account,
		Account_Desc,
		NIS_Desc,
		ProfitCenterDesc,
		{Profit Center},
		CCAU,
		CCAUDesc,
		{User Gin},
		{Reversed Flag},
		{Reference Document},
		{Transaction Code},
		{Transaction Code Description},
		{LDAP User Alias},
		{Product Line (Code)},
		{Product Line Group (Code)},
		{SL Product Line (Code)},
		{SL Product Line Group (Code)},
		{SL Sub Product Line (Code)},
		{Sub Product Line (Code)},
		{SL Area (Code)},
		SL_Geomarket_Code = {SL Geomarket (Code)},
		{SL Hemisphere (Code)},
		{SL Hemisphere (Desc)},
		{Sub Geomarket (Code)},
		SYS_CreatedBy,
		SYS_CreatedDate,
		{Country (Code)},
		Right_Country_Desc,
		SubAccnt_Minor,
		Year,
		Month,
		ERP_Data,
		ERP_UID_SPEND,
		ERP_UID_Zeroization,
		NIS_SubLine,
		ERP,
		ERP_UID,
		Facility_ID,
		Facility_Name,
		Facility_Status,
		Facility_Type,
		Facility_Owner,
		Business_Activity,
		Origin_Business,
		FDE_Country,
		FDE_City,
		Latitude,
		Longitude,
		Land_Area_Square_Meter,
		Build_Area_Square_Meter,
		Account_Type,
		{GL Account},
		AccountDesc
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelRenameGeoMarketandMgmtCountry
JnrExsSpendandGrpby select(mapColumn(
		TransAmount,
		BaseAmount,
		VendorName,
		Vendor,
		CurrencyCode,
		System,
		SourceCode,
		PONumber,
		InvoiceNo,
		PostingDate,
		Journal,
		Description,
		LineNbr,
		{Company (Desc)},
		Company,
		CountryDesc,
		Mgmt_Country_Code = MgmtCountryCode,
		Account,
		Account_Desc,
		NIS_Desc,
		ProfitCenterDesc,
		{Profit Center},
		CCAU,
		CCAUDesc,
		{User Gin},
		{Reversed Flag},
		{Reference Document},
		{Transaction Code},
		{Transaction Code Description},
		{LDAP User Alias},
		{Product Line (Code)},
		{Product Line Group (Code)},
		{SL Product Line (Code)},
		{SL Product Line Group (Code)},
		{SL Sub Product Line (Code)},
		{Sub Product Line (Code)},
		{SL Area (Code)},
		SL_Geomarket_Code = {SL Geomarket (Code)},
		{SL Hemisphere (Code)},
		{SL Hemisphere (Desc)},
		{Sub Geomarket (Code)},
		SYS_CreatedBy,
		SYS_CreatedDate,
		{Country (Code)},
		Right_Country_Desc,
		SubAccnt_Minor,
		Year,
		Month,
		ERP_Data,
		ERP_UID_SPEND,
		ERP_UID_Zeroization,
		NIS_SubLine,
		FDE_Country,
		ERP
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelRemoveJoinfields
JnrInnerOfficeCampusandUnique select(mapColumn(
		TransAmount,
		BaseAmount,
		VendorName,
		Vendor,
		CurrencyCode,
		System,
		SourceCode,
		PONumber,
		InvoiceNo,
		PostingDate,
		Journal,
		Description,
		LineNbr,
		{Company (Desc)},
		Company,
		CountryDesc,
		MgmtCountryCode,
		Account,
		Account_Desc,
		NIS_Desc,
		ProfitCenterDesc,
		{Profit Center},
		CCAU,
		CCAUDesc,
		{User Gin},
		{Reversed Flag},
		{Reference Document},
		{Transaction Code},
		{Transaction Code Description},
		{LDAP User Alias},
		{Product Line (Code)},
		{Product Line Group (Code)},
		{SL Product Line (Code)},
		{SL Product Line Group (Code)},
		{SL Sub Product Line (Code)},
		{Sub Product Line (Code)},
		{SL Area (Code)},
		{SL Geomarket (Code)},
		{SL Hemisphere (Code)},
		{SL Hemisphere (Desc)},
		{Sub Geomarket (Code)},
		SYS_CreatedBy,
		SYS_CreatedDate,
		{Country (Code)},
		Right_Country_Desc,
		SubAccnt_Minor,
		Year = SelRenameMulFields@Year,
		Month = SelRenameMulFields@Month,
		ERP_Data,
		ERP_UID_SPEND,
		ERP_UID_Zeroization,
		NIS_SubLine,
		ERP,
		FDE_Country
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelRemoveJoinFieldss
SrcSAPITTGLTransaciton derive(YearMonthFormat = toDate(left(YearMonth,4)+'-'+right(YearMonth,2)+'-'+'01'),
		{Profit Center} = ltrim(rtrim(trim({Profit Center})))) ~> DerColYearMonthFormat
SrcOrgSapITT, SrcSapITTMappinng exists(SrcOrgSapITT@{Profit Center (Code)} == SrcSapITTMappinng@{Profit Center (Code)},
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExsOrgSapITTandMappping
SrcSapITTMappinng, ExsOrgSapITTandMappping union(byName: true)~> UnSapITTMappingandExs
DerColYearMonthFormat, UnSapITTMappingandExs join({Profit Center} == {Profit Center (Code)},
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JnSapITTandUnSapITT
JnSapITTandUnSapITT select(mapColumn(
		{Transaction Amount},
		{Local  Amount},
		{Group  Amount},
		{Vendor Name},
		{Vendor Code},
		{Transaction Currency},
		System,
		{Sub Ledger Source},
		{PO Number},
		{Local  Currency},
		{Invoice Number},
		{GL Posting Date},
		{Document Number},
		{Doc Narration},
		{Doc Line Number},
		{Company (Desc)},
		Company,
		{Country (Desc)} = SrcSAPITTGLTransaciton@{Country (Desc)},
		Country,
		YearMonth,
		{GL Account (Code)},
		{GL Account (Desc)},
		NIS_Desc,
		{Profit Center (Desc)},
		{Profit Center},
		{Cost Center (Code)},
		{Cost Center (Desc)},
		{User Gin},
		{Reversed Flag},
		{Reference Document},
		{Transaction Code},
		{Transaction Code Description},
		{LDAP User Alias},
		YearMonthFormat,
		{Product Line (Code)},
		{Product Line Group (Code)},
		{SL Product Line (Code)},
		{SL Product Line Group (Code)},
		{SL Sub Product Line (Code)},
		{Sub Product Line (Code)},
		{SL Area (Code)},
		{SL Geomarket (Code)},
		{SL Hemisphere (Code)},
		{SL Hemisphere (Desc)},
		{Sub Geomarket (Code)},
		SYS_CreatedBy,
		SYS_CreatedDate,
		{Country (Code)},
		Right_Country_Desc = UnSapITTMappingandExs@{Country (Desc)}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelReqFieldsSapITT
SelReqFieldsSapITT derive(SubAccnt_Minor = {GL Account (Code)},
		Year = year(YearMonthFormat),
		Month = ltrim(toString(month(YearMonthFormat)),'0'),
		ERP_Data = 'SAP ITT',
		ERP_UID_SPEND = ltrim(rtrim({Cost Center (Code)})),
		ERP_UID_Zeroization = ltrim(rtrim({Cost Center (Code)}))) ~> DerColMultiColSapITT
UnSapITTMappingandExs filter({SL Geomarket (Code)} != 'N/A') ~> FltGeoMarketCode
UnZeroizationandSpend derive(AccountERP = ltrim(rtrim(Account))+ltrim(rtrim(ERP))) ~> DerColAccountERP
UnZeroizationandSpend derive(AccountERP = ltrim(rtrim(Account))+ltrim(rtrim(ERP))) ~> DerColERPAccountExs
